info.name: Flickr WideScreen - Applications helper v.6
info.description: Since Flickr change its way to connect to its API (Now Use of SSL , Https...), many application are broken. This Userstyles Add More Infos about all your authorizations stored in your flickr's profile: - Working / Not Working Flickr's applications in 2014 - Add a summarize for each. - Full name So, you can revoke them if you never use it or you can find a new solution. Add too Infos about Apps that i have tested (OK / NO / Full Name / ... etc...) in - The App Garden (Apps You're Using) : https://www.flickr.com/services/auth/list.gne - Your ACCOUNT SHARING Settings: https://www.flickr.com/account/sharing/ ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
info.additionalInfo: ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-) ▶ NEW v.6: - Improve many things... add more apps tested, clean the code - ADD support for ; The App Garden (Apps You're Using) : https://www.flickr.com/services/auth/list.gne Your ACCOUNT SHARING Settings: https://www.flickr.com/account/sharing/ Some Apps i meet, like: Flickr Commons 'On This Day' ► You can test my other Usertyles (Many are better for A WIDE SCREEN (1920x1080)!: ► Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE TOTAL (No GM) ► Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE TOTAL (GM Adapt) ► Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Userscripts (GM: cf greasemonkey), like GreasyFork : Flickr's Userscripts: ► Flickr WideScreen (GM) - Commented ON ► Flickr WideScreen (GM) - Flickr Functional Suite(Update 2014) - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FLUIDR ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - DACKR ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FLICKRIVER ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-) ▶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : ► My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (2014)) - Updated 2015. I have Updated all links from userscripts.org (defunct) , to point now to userscripts-mirror.org (Archives)). ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too.
